price: Sunã sanin bayyanannar rãyuwar dũniya, alhãli kuwa sũ shagalallu ne daga rãyuwar Lãhira.*
arabic: يَعۡلَمُونَ ظَٰهِرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
footnotes: * Dangantakar rashin sanin ĩkon Allah da sanin sha'anin dũniya da kuma jãhiltar al'amarin Lãhira,.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamūna ẓāhiran mina al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wahum ʿani al-ākhirati hum ghāfilūna
